description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Compete against the world in classic track and field games including sprinting, hurdles, long jump, swimming, ninja darts and throwing.  Rapid tournaments will have you racking up hundreds of medals in no time.  Legal notice: This game is in no way affiliated or related to the London 2012 Olympics. If you are looking for the official Olympics game we suggest you try searching for London 2012.
